item.title: CVE-2023-29098|2024-08-02T14:00:15.935Z -- artistscope -- copysafe%20web%20protection
item.description: Unauth. Reflected Cross-Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in ArtistScope CopySafe Web Protection plugin <=Â 3.13 versions.

item.title: CVE-2024-37514|2024-08-02T03:57:39.409Z -- artistscope -- copysafe%20web%20protection
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ArtistScope CopySafe Web Protection allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CopySafe Web Protection: from n/a through 3.14.
